question: Please analyze this URL https://metroworldtrade.com/
thought: I need to start by accessing the URL to see if it is a scam website. The website is accessible, now I need to extract the text and check for any characteristics of a scam website. The website mentions unusually high profits and offers different investment plans, which could be a characteristic of a scam website. I also need to check the contact information and privacy policy for any suspicious or unusual details. I need to check the WHOIS information for the domain to verify the legitimacy of the website. The WHOIS information for the domain also shows some red flags. Based on this analysis, the website https://metroworldtrade.com/ exhibits characteristics of a scam website. {

answer.reason: The website mentions unusually high profits offers different investment plans and has contact information that seems to be suspicious. The WHOIS information for the domain also shows some red flags.

context: I want you to act as a professional scam website detection expert. You are tasked with analyzing the content of URLs given to you to determine if the URL is a scam website or not. Scam websites have the following features. 1. Unusually low prices and claims of free. 2. Claims to be able to get an amount of money that is generally not possible. 3. Texts that target human psychological weaknesses exist on websites. 4. Information on non-existent companies. 5. Handling different products from common e-commerce websites. 6. Inquiry phone number and email address are not appropriate for business use. 7. Privacy of customer information notation is ambiguous. 8. Payment methods are not common and are unusual. 9. The information listed has not been updated.
